shared.Memo module¶

Memo

Used to connect to Memo REST

shared.Memo.create(path, data)¶

Create

Make a POST request

Parameters

  • {str} -- The path on the service (path) –

  • {mixed} -- The data to pass to the request (data) –

Returns

dict

shared.Memo.customerName(customerId, to_int=False, additional_fields=False)¶

Customer Name

Returns the first and last name of a single ID, or a dict of KNK IDs to names of customers for multiple IDs

Parameters

  • customerId (uint|uint[]) – A single ID or multiple IDs

  • to_int (bool) – Optional, if set, converts IDs to ints

  • additional_fields – (False|list): Optional list of additional fields

Returns

dict

  • {mixed} -- The data to pass to the request (data) –

Returns

shared.Memo.name(_id)¶

Name

Returns the first and last name of a single ID, or a dict of memo IDs to names of users for multiple IDs

Parameters

_id (uint|uint[]) – A single ID or multiple IDs

Returns

dict
